prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
### General Principles
- Based on Markdown, easy to read and write.
- Designed to be understood by both humans and machines.
- File extension: `.book`, encoded in UTF-8 without BOM.
- Two variants: flat (simple prompt) and full (structured with tasks, commands, and prompts).
- Compatible with version control systems like git.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
